UrddhvastiśhTha̍ dhruvastvam| | sUryasya̍ tvAq cakśhuśhA&nvI̱kśhE| RujavE̱ tvA| sAqdhavE̱ tvA| sukśhityai tvAq BUtyai̱ tvA| | idamahamamumAmuśhyAyaṇaM̍ ~MviśA paśuBir̍ brahmavarcasEna paryUhAmi|̍ gAqyatrEṇa# tvAq CandasA &&cCRuṇadmi|̍ traiśhTuBEna̍ tvAq CandasA &&cCRuṇadmi|̍ jAgatEna̍ tvAq CandasA &&cCRuṇadmi|̍ CRuṇattu# tvAq vAk ( )| CRuṇattu tvOrk| CRuṇattu# tvA haviH| CRundhi vAca̱m| CRundhyUrja̱m| CRundhi haviH| | dEva# puraścara saGyAsantvA|̍ | 10 (16)

brahman̍ pravargyEṇa̍ pracariśhyAmaH|̍ hOtar̍ GarmamaBiśhTuhi|̍ agnIdrauhiṇau̍ purODAśAqvadhiśraya|̍ pratiprasthAtarviha̍ra|̍ prastOtaH̍ sAmAni̍ gAya| | yajuryuktaṃq̍ sAmaBirAkta̍KantvA|̍ viśvai̱r dEvairanumatam̍ marudBiH|̍ dakśhiṇABiH̍ pratatam̍ pArayiśhṇum| stuBO# vahantu sumanasyamAnam|̍ sa nO rucandhEhyahRu̍ṇIyamAnaH̍ ( )| BUrBuvassuvaH|̍ OmindravantaH̍ pracarata|̍ | 11 (12)

brahman pracariśhyAmaH|̍ hOtar̍ GarmamaBiśhTuhi|̍ | yamAya# tvA maKAya# tvA| sUryasya̍ harasE̍ tvA| | prAqṇAya svAhA̱ vyAqnAya svAhA# &pAqnAya svAhA̱| cakśhuśhE̍ svAhAq śrOtrAya̍ svAhA̱| manasE̍ svAhA# vAqcE sarasvatyai̍ svAhA̱| dakśhAya̍ svAhAq kratavE̍ svAhA̱| OjasE̍ svAhAq balAya̍ svAhA̱| | dEvastvA# savitA maddhvA&naktu|̍ 12 (10)

pRuthivIM tapasastrAyasva|̍ arcirasi̍ śOcirasi̍ jyOtirasi̍ tapO&si|̍ saṃsIdasva̍ mahAṃ asi|̍ śOcasva̍ dEvavItamaH|̍ vi dhUmamagnE̍ aruśham miyEddhya|̍ sRuja praśasta̍ daṛ śatam| | a~jjanti yam prathayantO̍ na viprA̱H| vapAvantannAgninAq̍ tapantaH|̍ piturna putra upasi̍ prEśhThaH|̍ A GarmO agnimRutayannasAdIt|̍ | 13 (10)

sammA asi|̍ vimA asi|̍ unmA asi|̍ antarikśhasyAntarddhira̍si|̍ | divantapasastrAyasva|̍ AqBir gIrBir yadatO# na Unam| ApyAyaya̍ harivO varddhamAnaH|̍ yadA stOtRuByO mahi# gOtrA rujAsi|̍ BUyiśhThaBAjO adha# tE syAma| | śukrantE# anyad yajatantE̍# anyat| 17 (10)

viśhurUpE̍ ahanI̍ dyaurivAsi|̍ viśvAq hi mAqyA avasi̍ svadhAvaH| BadrA tE# pUśhanniha rAqtirastu|̍ | aṛ han̍ biBaṛ śhi sAyakAni̍ dhanva|̍ aṛ hanniśhkaM̍ ~MyajataM̍ ~MviśvarUpam|̍ aṛ hannidaM̍ dayasE̍ viśva-mabBuvam|̍ na vA OjIyO̍ rudra tvadasti|̍ | gAqyatramasi|̍ traiśhTuBamasi|̍ jAgatamasi̍ ( )| madhu madhu madhu|̍ | 18 (11)

daśa prAcIrdaśa# BAsi dakśhiṇA| daśa# pratIcIrdaśa# BAqsyudIcIH|̍ daśOrddhvA BAsi̍ sumanasyamAnaH|̍ sa nO rucandhEhyahRu̍ṇIyamAnaH|̍ | agniśhTvAq vasuBiH̍ purastA̱d-rOcayatu gAyatrEṇa CandasA|̍ sa mA# rucitO rOcaya|̍ | indrastvA̍ rudrair-dakśhiṇatO̍ rOcayatu̍ traiśhTuBEna̍ CandasA|̍ sa mA# rucitO rOcaya|̍ varuṇastvA&&dityaiH̍ paścAd-rOcayatu̍ jAgatEna̍ CandasA|̍ sa mA# rucitO rOcaya|̍ 19 (10)

Garma yA tE# divi śuk| yA gAyatrE̍ Candasi|̍ yA brA̱hmaṇE| yA havirddhAnE̱|̍ tAnta# EtEnAvayajE̍ svAhA̱| | Garma yA tE&ntarikśhE̍ śuk| yA traiśhTuBE̍ Candasi|̍ yA rAjanyE̱|̍ yA&&gnI̱ddhrE| tAnta# EtEnAvayajE̍ svAhA̱| 42 (10)

anaśanAyukO̍ Bavati| ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ rantirnAmAsi̍ divyO gandharva̍ ityAha|̍ rUpamEvAsyai-tan-mahimAnaṃq̍ rantim̍ bandhutAqM ~MvyAcaśhTE|̍ samahamAyuśhAq̍ sam prAqṇEnEtyAha|̍ AqśiśhamEvaitAmAśA̱stE|̍ vyasau̍ yO̱&smAn dvEśhTi ya~jca# vayam dviśhma ityAha|̍ aBicAqra EvAsyaiśhaH| acikradad-vRuśhAq̍ harirityAha|̍ vRuśhAq hyEśhaH|̍ 90 (10)

vRuśhAq hariH|̍ mahAn-mitrO na daṛ̍ śata ityAha|̍ stautyEvainamEtat|̍ cidasi̍ samudrayOnirityA̍ha|̍ svAmEvainaM ~MyOni~ggamayati|̍ namastE̍ astu mA mA# hiṃsIrityAqhAhiṃsAyai|̍ viśvAvasuṃ̍ sOmagandharvamityAha|̍ yadEvAsya# kriyamAṇasyAntaryanti̍|̍ tadEvAsyaitEnA pyAyayati|̍ viśvAvasuraBi̍ tannO# gRuṇAqtvityAha|̍ 91 (10)

pUrvamEvOditam|̍ uttarEṇAqBigRu̍ṇAti|̍ dhiyO# hinvAqnO dhiya innO# avyAqdityAha|̍ RutUnEvAsmai# kalpayati| prAsA̱m gandharvO amRutAni̍ vOcadityAha|̍ prAqṇA vA amRutA̱H| prAqṇAnEvAsmai# kalpayati| EtattvandEva̍ Garma dEvO dEvAnupAgAq̍ ityAha|̍ dEvO hyEśha̍ sandEvAnupaiti|̍ idamaham manuśhyO̍# manuśhyAnityA̍ha|̍ 92 (10)

manuśhyO# hi| Eśha san-manuśhyA̍nupaiti̍|̍ IśvarO vai pravargya̍mudvAqsayann̍|̍ prajAm paśUnth sOmapIthama̍nUdvAsaH̍ sOmapIthAnumEhi̍|̍ saha prajayA# saha rAqyaspOśhEṇEtyAha|̍ prajAmEva paśUnth sOmapIthamAqtman̍ dhattE|̍ sumitrA na Apa OśhadhayaH̍ santvityAha|̍ AqśiśhamEvaitAmAśA̱stE|̍ durmitrAstasmai# BUyAsur-yO̱&smAn-dvEśhTi ya~jca# vayam dviśhma ityAha|̍ aBicAqra EvAsyaiśhaH ( )| pra vA EśhO̱&smAl lOkAccyavatE|̍ yaH pravargya̍mudvAqsaya̍ti|̍ udu tyam citramiti# saurIByAmRugByAm̍ punarEtya gAṛ hapatyE̍ juhOti| ayam ~Mvai lOkO gAṛ hapatyaH|̍ asminnEva lOkE pratitiśhThati|̍ asau Kalu vA AdityaH̍ suvargO̍ lOkaH| yath saurI BavataH|̍ tEnaiva suvargAl̍ lOkAnnaiti|̍ | 93 (18) anuvAkam - 10

prajApatiM̍ ~Mvai dEvAH śukram payO&duhrann|̍ tadE̱ByO na vyaBavat|̍ tadagnirvyakarOt|̍ tAni śukriyAṇi̍ sAmA̱nyaBavann| tEśhAqM ~MyO rasO&tyakśharat|̍ tAni# śukrayajUṅśhyaBavann|̍ śukriyAṇAqM̍ ~MvA EtAni śukriyAṇi|̍ sAqmapayasam~MvA EtayOranyat|̍ dEvAnAmanyatpaya̍H|̍ yadgOH payaH|̍ 94 (10)

tath sAmnaH payaH|̍ yadajAyai payaH|̍ tad-dEvAnAqm payaH|̍ tasmAqd-yatraitair-yajurBiścara̍nti|̍ tat payasA̍ caranti| prajApatimEva̍ tad dEvAnpayasAq&nnAdyE̍na̍ samarddhayanti|̍ Eśha ha tvai sAqkśhAt pravargya̍m̍ Bakśhayati| yasyaivaM ~MviduśhaH̍ pravargyaH̍ pravRujyatE̱| uttaravEdyA-mudvAsayEt-tEja̍skAmasya|̍ tEjO vA uttaravEdiH|̍ 95 (10)

tEjaH̍ pravargyaH|̍ tEjasaiva̍ tEjaH samarddhayati|̍ uttaravEdyA-mudvAsayE-danna̍kAmasya|̍ śirO vA Etad-yajñasya|̍ yat pravargya̍H|̍ muKamuttaravEdiH|̍ śIrśhṇaiva muKaṃq sandadhAtyannAdyA̍ya|̍ annAqda Eva Bavati|̍ yatra Kalu vA EtamudvAsitaM̍ ~MvayAṃsi̍ paryAsatE|̍ pari vai tAṃ samA̱m prajA vayAṅsyAsatE|̍ 96 (10)

tasmA-duttaravEdyA-mEvOdvA̍sayEt|̍ prajAnA̱m gOpIthAya|̍ purO vA# paścAdvOdvAsayEt|̍ purastAqdvA EtajjyOtirudEti|̍ tat paścAnnimrOcati|̍ svAmEvainam ~MyOnimanUdvAsayati|̍ apAm maddhya udvAsayEt|̍ apAM ~MvA EtanmaddhyAq-jjyOtirajAyata|̍ jyOtiH̍ pravargyaH|̍ sva EqvainaM ~MyOnau pratiśhThApayati|̍ 97 (10)

yam dviśhyAt| yatra sa syAt| tasyA̱m diśyudvAsayEt|̍ Eśha vA agnir-vai̱śvAnaraH| yat-pravargya̍H|̍ agninaivainaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnarEṇAqBi pravartayati|̍ audumbaryAqṃq̍ śAKAyAqmudvA̍sayEt|̍ UrgvA udumbara̍H|̍ annam̍ prAqṇaH| śugGarmaH| 98 (10)

idamaha-mamuśhyAmuśhyAyaṇasya̍# śucA prAqṇamapi# dahAqmItyAha|̍ śucaivAsya# prAqṇamapi# dahati| tAqjagArtimArcCati|̍ yatra# darBA upadIka̍santatAqH̍ syuH| tadudvAsayEd-vRuśhTi̍kAmasya|̍ EtA vA apAmanUjJAva̍ryO̍ nAma|̍ yad-darBAH| asau Kalu vA Aditya̍ itO vRuśhTimudIrayati|̍ asAvEvAsmA# AdityO vRuśhTinniyacCati|̍ tA ApO niyatAq̍ dhanvanA̍ yanti ( )| | 99 (10) anuvAkam - 11

prajApatiH̍ samBriyamAṇaH|̍ samrATth samBRutaH|̍ GarmaH pravRuktaH|̍ mahAqvIra udvAsitaH|̍ asau Kalu vAvaiśha AdityaH|̍ yat pravargya̍H|̍ sa EtAni nAmA̱nyakuruta| ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ vidurEnannAmnA̱|̍ brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| 100 (10)

yO vai vasIyAṃ̍ sam~MyathAnAqmamupacara̍ti|̍ puṇyA̱rtiM ~Mvai sa tasmai# kAmayatE| puṇyA̱rtimasmai kAmayantE| ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ tasmAdEvaM̍ ~MvidvAn| Garma iti divA&&cakśhIta|̍ samrADiti nakta̱m| EtE vA Etasya# priyE tanuvau̱| EtE asya̍ priyE nAmanI|̍ priyayaivainam̍ tanuvA̱| 101 (10)

priyEṇa nAmnAq samarddhayati|̍ kIrtirasya̍ pUrvA gacCati̍ janatAmAyataH|̍ gAqyatrI dEvEByO&pA̱krAmat| tAndEvAH pravargyE̍ṇaivAnu̍ vyaBavann|̍ pravargyEṇApnuvann|̍ yaccaturviṃśatiH̍ kRutvaH̍ pravargyam̍ pravRuṇakti|̍ gAqyatrImEva tadanu viBavati|̍ gAqyatrImA̱pnOti| pUrvA̱&sya janaM̍ ~MyataH kIrtirgacCati|̍ vaiśvadEvaH saṃsannaH|̍ 102 (10)

vasavaH̍ pravRuktaH|̍ sOmO&BikIryamA̍ṇaH|̍ AqśvinaH payasyAnIyamA̍nE|̍ mArutaH kvathann|̍ pauśhṇa udantaH|̍ sAqrasvatO viśhyandamAnaH|̍ maitraH śarO# gRuhItaH| tEja udyatO̍ vAqyuH| hriyamAṇaH̍ prajApatiH|̍ hUyamAnO̍ vAgGutaH| 103 (10)

asau Kalu vAvaiśha AdityaH|̍ yat pravargya̍H|̍ sa EtAni nAmA̱nyakuruta| ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ vidurEnannAmnA̱|̍ brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| yanmRunmaya-mAhutinnAś~jutE&tha̍|̍ kasmAdEśhO̱&ś~juta̍ iti|̍ vAgEśha iti# brUyAt| vAqcyEva̍ vAcam̍ dadhAti| 104 (10)

tasmAdaś~jutE|̍ prajApatirvA̍ Eśha dvAdaśadhA̍ vihitaH|̍ yat pravargya̍H|̍ yat prAgavakAqśEBya̍H|̍ tEna# prajA asRujata|̍ avakAqśair-dEvAsurAna̍sRujata|̍ yadUrddhvamavakAqśEBya̍H|̍ tEnAnnamasRujata|̍ annam̍ prajApatiH|̍ prajApatirvAvaiśhaH̍ ( )| | 105 (10) (vadanti - tanuvAq - saṃsannO̍ - hUyamAnO̍ vAgGutO - dadhA̍ - tyEśhaH (A11) anuvAkam - 12

savitA BUtvA prathamE&han̍ pravRujyatE|̍ tEna kAmAṃ# Eti| yad-dvitIyE&han-pravRujyatE̱|̍ agnir-BUtvA dEvAnEti|̍ yat-tRutIyE&han-pravRujyatE̱|̍ vAqyur-BUtvA prAqṇAnEti|̍ yaccaturthE&ha̍n-pravRujyatE̱|̍ AqdityO BUtvA raśmInEti|̍ yat pa~jcamE&ha̍n-pravRujyatE̱|̍ candramA# BUtvA nakśhatrAṇyEti|̍ 106 (10)

yath-śhaśhThE&han-pravRujyatE̱|̍ Rutur-BUtvA sam~MvathsaramE̍ti|̍ yath-saptamE&ha̍n-pravRujyatE̱|̍ dhAqtA BUtvA śakvarImEti|̍ yadaśhTamE&ha̍n-pravRujyatE̱|̍ bRuhaspatir-BUtvA̍ gAyatrImE̍ti|̍ yan-navamE&ha̍n-pravRujyatE̱|̍ mitrO BUtvA trivRuta# imAn ~MlOkAnEti|̍ yad-daśamE&ha̍n-pravRujyatE̱|̍ varuṇO̍ BUtvA virAjamEti|̍ 107 (10)

yadEkAdaśE&ha̍n-pravRujyatE̱|̍ indrO# BUtvA triśhTuBamEti|̍ yad-dvAdaśE&ha̍n-pravRujyatE̱|̍ sOmO# BUtvA sutyAmEti|̍ yat-purastAdupasadA̱m̍ pravRujyatE̱| tasmAditaH̍ parA~gamUM̍ ~MlOkAṅstapannEti|̍ yadupariśhTA-dupasadA̱m̍ pravRujyatE̱| tasmAdamutO&rvA~gimAM̍ ~MlOkAṅstapannEti|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ aiva tapati̍ ( )| | 108 (10) Prapaataka Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- dEvA vai satraṃ - sAvitram̍ - pariśritE̍ - brahman pracariśhyAmO̍ - &gniśhTvAq - śirO̱ grIvA - dEvasya# raśanAM - ~MviśvAq AśAq - dharma yA ta̱ - prajApatiṃ̍ śukram - prajApatiH̍ samBriyamAṇaH̍ - savitA BUtvA dvAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Dasinis :- (dEvA vai satraṃ - sa KadiraH̍ - pariśritE̍ - &BipUrva - mathO rakśhasAqm̍ - graiśhmAvEvAsmai̍ - brahma vai dEvAnAq - maśvinA̍ Garmam pAtam̍ - prAqṇO vai - vRuśhAq harir - yO vai vasIyAṃ̍ sam~MyathAnAqma maśhTOttaraśatam)̍ First and Last Padam in TA, 8th Prapaatakam :- (dEvA vai satra - maiva tapati)|̍ | hariH̍ Om| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya AraṇyakE aśhTamaH prapAThakaH samAptaH| | | | iti taittirIya yajurAraṇyakam samAptam| | ================
